title: Victim-DirkBogardeDVD2avi
description:
Homosexual scandal in London 1961.
From the DVD jacket:

In the early sixties, Basil Dearden&#039;s VICTIM was perhaps the most daring film to appear on the British screen. A highly respected, but closeted barrister, Melville Farr, risks his marriage and reputation te take on an elusive blackmail ring terrorizing gay men with the threat of public exposure and police action. Starring Dirk Bogarde in a career-making role, VICTIM is widely regarded as the film that provoked the British Parliament to begin amending its cruel and archaic laws against the "homosexual acts".

Apart from the movie in this torrent:
- Theatrical trailer
- "Dirk Bogarde in conversation" a filmed interview

Enjoy!
